parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The type of the database. Valid values:

*   **MYSQL**
*   **MSSQL**
*   **Oracle**

parameters.name: InstanceUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the agent that is used to back up the data of the database.

> You can call the [DescribeUniBackupDatabase](~~DescribeUniBackupDatabase~~) operation to query the UUID.

parameters.name: UniRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the server that hosts the database.
